?Oxide Pang&#039;s Bite Till Die series of films? 
Plot:
Similar to Oxide Pang&#039;s Hong Kong thriller The Detective, the Bite Till Die series revolves around a private detective agency run by Dragonhair. The former mercenary investigates various mysterious cases along with his martial arts-adept assistant Gene and tomboyish adopted daughter Anna. This time in Killing Box, Dragonhair has barely had the chance to bask in the happiness of his daughter&#039;s return from Japan when bullets and a bomb-like box come flying his way. The incidents seem to be connected with Dragonhair&#039;s shady past, but it may be his daughter who ends up paying for his past trespasses.
